meanings.sent1: We will be foregathering our supplies before the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The team always foregathers for a quick meeting before starting a project.
meanings.sent3: Foregathering all the ingredients for the cake made baking much easier.
meanings.sent4: The birds foregathered in the trees, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: Foregathering our thoughts before the presentation helped us stay organized.

meanings.sent1: The foregathering of friends before the party was full of excitement.
meanings.sent2: The foregathering of data is crucial for accurate research results.
meanings.sent3: The foregathering of clouds hinted at an impending storm.
meanings.sent4: The foregathering of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The foregathering of students in the auditorium signaled the start of the event.
